CreateDictionaries.largeFileStorageTxtOnly: Large file storage only supports txt file type
CreateDictionaries.invalidFileFormat: {name} is not a txt or csv file. Please upload a file in the correct format!
CreateDictionaries.chooseStorageMethodTip: You can choose one of the following storage methods based on your needs. The storage method does not affect usage:
CreateDictionaries.fileStorageTip: File Storage: Stores the dictionary as a file locally, does not support hit count,
CreateDictionaries.file_storage_tip: File Storage: Stores the dictionary as a file locally, does not support hit count, <highlight>faster upload speed</highlight>
CreateDictionaries.db_storage_tip: Database Storage: Reads dictionary data and stores it in the database, supports hit count, <highlight>easier search</highlight>
CreateDictionaries.large_file_storage_tip: Large File Storage: When the uploaded file is larger than <size>20M</size>, it supports large file storage method, only supports txt, <highlight>more convenient storage</highlight>
CreateDictionaries.file_drag_tip: You can drag files into the box, or <highlight>click here to import</highlight>
CreateDictionaries.batchFolderUploadTip: Supports batch folder upload (supported file types: txt/csv)
CreateDictionaries.largeFileUploadTip: Supports large file upload (supported file type: txt)
CreateDictionaries.autoDedupCheck: Automatic deduplication check, please wait patiently...

FolderComponent.folderNameDuplicate: Folder name is duplicated, cannot create
FolderComponent.folderNameDuplicateEdit: Folder name is duplicated, cannot edit

DeleteConfirm.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete
DeleteConfirm.confirmDeleteTip: Confirming deletion will permanently delete it

FileComponent.convertingToDatabaseStorage: Converting to Database Storage, please wait patiently...

NewPayload.selectDictionaryFromList: Please click the list on the left to select the dictionary you want to view
NewPayload.payloadMigrationTip: Due to the refactoring of the {Payload} feature, to ensure continued use, you need to click OK to migrate the old data. Migrating data will not cause any data loss.
NewPayload.engineVersionTooLowTip: The current engine version is too low to use the new {Payload} feature. Please update the engine to v1.2.9-sp3 or above.

ReadOnlyNewPayload.pleaseSelectDictionaryOrFolder: Please select the payload or folder to insert

NewPayloadLocalList.selectDictionaryToInsert: Select the dictionary you want to insert
NewPayloadLocalList.selectExportContent: Please select the content to export

PayloadOnlineContent.fuzzModuleRenderTip: Can be rendered via fuzz module {{x(dictionaryName)}}

NewPayloadTable.addHitCountFieldNotice: Added Hit Count field. The higher the hit count, the higher its priority during brute-forcing.
